column4: Hi All, I have a problem with my sound card, may I ask some questions?
I've read that it should... it's a via vt82c686
that should be compaticble with te via82cxxx driver...
how can i know if proper modules are loaded?
seams so... but in the device manager it says "unknown"
i checked... but cant' understand it.
you see a lot of sliders?
and make sure nothing is muted.... [x]  mute  <--- don't have this
